LIFE-IS-A-CHEMICAL-REACTION that's pretty nice and neutral way to put it..It's sad but cant deny the reality of circumstances...Often the cucks (if we may call it) keep toggling between victim insertion as the "love" was always tagged with abuse irl and get stuck in a depreciation loop and the abuser ,ironically beating their own past persona.

Rian is one of my fave artists.  Some of  his stuff is pretty heavy, but I think hes a fucking genius.  His storys are an artistic representation of the hopelessness that many guys feel after being shamed and denied by beautiful girls in real life.  (And not in a sexy way, usually.. for instance being called a pervert and possible rapist by a girl who later says "A real man just forced me to have sex, and it was the best ever."  We realize at that point that we can't win, and that even pointing out the hypocrisy of modern girls will be tantamount to social suicide.  So we try to sexualize that despair- masochism is neat that way. =)
Rating each and every one of my favorites #23 8/10
Compared to the artist's other works, this one is light af. (and hot)
i mean he can always just quit and get another gig if he's not into it

Not my cup of tea, but it holds something for those who hold this fetish. The lore of the mansion within the first few pages had got me hooked instantly, is this mansion legal? Do they have the power to only hire non-virgins? Have they alerted the workers unions and do they provide insurances? A mansion like this is not much more than a brothel so that brings the question, are they in a state or country where this is legal? Does this happen quite often for people to know of its requirements? I have so many questions, but here's my rating.
Fapability: 4.5/10, it's not to my taste but it certainly isnt bad, it's just meh
Lore: 7.5/10, when a work can give me a multitude of questions in the first pages you know the lore is good.
Story: 4/10, again, not my fetish, but the story of the guy becoming a pet is nothing new, not transformative enough, but it satisfies its niche.
Overall enjoyability: 5/10, an interesting lore can only bring so much excitement, I wouldn't fap to it, but you may
Aww man, this cheeky girl... I wished there was more action thou :D
Yamahata Rian is so good. Can't wait to buy the tankoubon
